name: @takaro/mock-gameserver
description: A mock gameserver for testing purposes, acts just like a real gameserver

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist/lib/map/tiles && cp -r src/lib/map/tiles dist/lib/map/ && tsc -p ./tsconfig.build.json
scripts.start:dev: mkdir -p dist/lib/map/tiles && cp -r src/lib/map/tiles dist/lib/map/ && concurrently --names "COMPILE,RUN" "npm run start:dev:compile" "npm run start:dev:run"
